message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the price of $150. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $80 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $150 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $120. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $120 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can you reconsider?
